TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AudioGroupMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.
Docs.remarks:
Enumerates value returned by the following:
.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Net.Rtp.AudioGroupMode EchoSuppression = int32(3)

summary.para: This mode is similar to except the echo suppression is enabled. It should be only used when the speaker phone is on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Net.Rtp.AudioGroupMode Muted = int32(1)

summary.para: This mode is similar to except the microphone is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Net.Rtp.AudioGroupMode Normal = int32(2)

summary.para: This mode indicates that the speaker, the microphone, and all s in the group are enabled. First, the packets received from the streams are decoded and mixed with the audio recorded from the microphone. Then, the results are played back to the speaker, encoded and sent back to each stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Net.Rtp.AudioGroupMode OnHold = int32(0)

summary.para: This mode is similar to except the speaker and the microphone are both disabled.
